name: Robbit Mon Dieu
description: Robbit Mon Dieu (ロビット・モン・ジャ), sometimes referred to as Jumping Flash! 3, is a 3D platform game for the Sony PlayStation. It was developed by Sugar & Rockets and published by Sony Computer Entertainment for the PlayStation in Japan on October 14, 1999. It is the third and final game in the Jumping Flash! series. The game was later released on the Japanese PlayStation Network on July 26, 2007.
